cab.content: PHi:1* ifMilitary Secret,.2m :iti Hiifywrt Viceroy, Army Department, to the Secretary of Stare for India,18*7* Aprti 1918.(Received 19th, 10 a.m.)& 4991. Marri situation. Klietrans having submitted dispersal to their stations of Dera Ghazi Khan Force units is being ordered.Dulci Force will move on Kahan on 18th or shortly after.A few of the leading Marri head-men have now come in.
